test-suite.name: File Navigation Functions Integration Tests.File navigation functions

test-case.name: File Navigation Functions Integration Tests.File navigation functions... function navigates up one directory
File Navigation Functions Integration Tests.File navigation functions.... function navigates up two directories
File Navigation Functions Integration Tests.File navigation functions..... function navigates up three directories

File Navigation Functions Integration Tests.File navigation functions.downloads alias navigates to Downloads
File Navigation Functions Integration Tests.File navigation functions.docs alias navigates to Documents
